metadata.purpose: Follow up ALL M1 flagged domains including social, bullying, mood, and digital stress
metadata.adaptiveTrigger: Students flagged in M1 for social, bullying, mood, or digital stress domains

scenarios.triggerCondition: Always ask first for ALL students

questions.question: I feel like I can be myself around my friends.
I look forward to seeing my friends at school.
I feel safe from teasing or bullying in my class.
I have at least one friend I can talk to when something is bothering me.
I feel included in most class activities.

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q5 >=3 (Felt a little included or not at all included)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q2 shows improvement, social integration is developing

questions.question: Do you feel more included in your class now compared to a few weeks ago?
Have you made any new friends or connections in class?
Do you participate in group activities or discussions in class?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q6 = No or Not sure (No close friend to rely on)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 = Yes, peer support is developing

questions.question: Do you have a close friend you can rely on now?
Do you have someone you can share personal things with?
My friends encourage me to do well in school.

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q8 = Yes (Experienced bullying, teasing, or being left out)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 = Yes or Q2 = Yes, bullying situation is improving

questions.question: Has the bullying or teasing situation improved since M1?
I have been excluded from a group chat or game recently.
Did you report the bullying to a teacher or counselor?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q25 >=3 (Rumors spread or made fun of online often/always)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 shows reduction, online bullying is decreasing

questions.question: Has anyone spread rumors about you online or made fun of you on social media in the last 2 weeks?
Have you blocked or reported anyone who was bothering you online?
I feel left out of group chats.

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q13 >=3 (Social media makes them feel stressed often/always)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 shows reduction, digital stress is decreasing

questions.question: Using social media makes me feel stressed or worried.
Have you reduced your social media time in the last 2 weeks?
Do you know how to take a break from social media when it feels stressful?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q7 >=3 OR M1 Q20 >=3 (Low mood at school or feeling sad/lonely)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q2 shows improvement, mood is stabilizing

questions.question: How would you rate your overall mood at school now?
Do you still feel sad or lonely even when you are with people?
Have you talked to anyone about how you've been feeling?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q3 >=3 OR M1 Q4 >=3 (Low academic confidence or poor homework management)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q2 shows improvement, academic adjustment is working

questions.question: How confident do you feel about doing well in your classes now?
How well are you managing your schoolwork and homework now?
Have you asked for help with subjects you find difficult?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q9 = No or Not sure (No adult at school to talk to)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 = Yes, support system is developing

questions.question: Is there an adult at school you feel comfortable talking to now?
Do you know how to contact the school counselor if you need help?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged family concerns

questions.question: How are things at home?
Do you feel supported by your family?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 indicated ongoing worries

questions.question: Are you still feeling worried or stressed?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged physical symptoms

questions.question: Are you still experiencing physical symptoms (headaches, stomach aches, etc.)?
Do these symptoms affect your daily activities?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged low self-concept about strengths

questions.question: Can you name at least one thing you're good at?
Have you used any of your strengths recently?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in ADHD Screen domain

questions.question: Is it hard for you to pay attention in class?
Do you find it difficult to finish your work?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Academic Skills domain

questions.question: Have you been able to follow your study schedule this week?
Are you struggling to find a quiet place to study?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Anger Coping domain

questions.question: Have you used your calming strategies when you felt angry recently?
Do you feel like your anger is becoming harder to control?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Emotional Literacy domain

questions.question: Is it getting easier to understand what you're feeling?
Do you often feel confused by your own emotions?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Girls Health domain

questions.question: Have you had to miss school or sports recently because of cycle pain?
Do your parents know how much discomfort you are in?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in LD Screen domain

questions.question: Are the words still moving around when you try to read?
Does your head hurt after reading for more than 10 minutes?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Memory Strategies domain

questions.question: Are your memory tricks helping you remember your lessons better?
Do you feel like you are forgetting things even when you try hard?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Romantic domain

questions.question: Are your feelings for someone making it hard to focus on school?
Are you feeling pressured by friends to date someone?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Self domain

questions.question: Are you still having thoughts about not wanting to be here?
Have you talked to a trusted adult about these feelings since we last spoke?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Self-harm domain

questions.question: In the last month, have you thought about hurting yourself?
Have you felt you'd be better off not being alive?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Social Media Risk domain

questions.question: Has anyone else asked you for private photos or info online?
Do you feel safe when you are on your phone at night?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Social Media Safety domain

questions.question: Is anyone currently threatening you or making you feel scared online?
Have you blocked the person who was making you feel uncomfortable?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Substance Detail domain

questions.question: Have you felt pressured to try cigarettes or alcohol with your friends?
Are you worried about how much your friends are using substances?

actionProtocol.improved: Continue current support; maintain routine monitoring
actionProtocol.noChange: Brief check-in within 1 week; provide additional resources
actionProtocol.worsened: Counselor follow-up within 3 days; reassess support strategy
